CN.content:

Paragraph: PFD2TBT and the ter-polymer solutions also exhibited two absorption bands at around 410 and 520 nm.

2. ter-polymer solutions - This is the second material name entity in the paragraph.

Therefore, the material name entities in the paragraph are "PFD2TBT" and "ter-polymer solutions".

1. PFD2TBT - This is a material name entity in the paragraph.
2. ter-polymer solutions - This is also a material name entity in the paragraph.

There are no irrelevant entities in the paragraph. Both entities clearly refer to materials.

Paragraph: PFD2TBT and the ter-polymer solutions also exhibited two absorption bands at around 410 and 520 nm.

2. ter-polymer solutions - This is a general term that refers to a class of materials, but it is still a property in the context of the paragraph. Therefore, it can also be considered a "Property Name" entity.
3. 410 nm and 520 nm - These are wavelength values in nanometers, which are properties of the absorption bands exhibited by the materials. Therefore, they can be considered "Property Name" entities.

* 520 nm
